title: Item Sets?
body: I honestly have no clue where the items sets would be, or if their even in the client.  If at all possible, could someone tell me where the items set editor is, or is the absence of the editor a sign that item sets won't exist in the League client anymore?

replies.body: It is not a feature being worked on at the moment, however discussion is on going.

> discussion is on going.

That's an upgrade from what I last heard, which is that there weren't plans to bring it to the new client.

I don't know what your usage metrics look like, and I completely understand having to deprioritize less-used features, but you can add me as another person *really* hoping Item Sets make it over eventually, even if it takes a while.

If nothing else, it's really nice to be able to look up and read about items in-client.

i think these voting [results](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/JsIF58l3-item-sets) speak for themselves.

(spoiler: everyone wants the item set maker, and **NO ONE** wants it removed)

seriously though, WHO DID YOU GUYS ASK??? what is your control group for your survey on who uses item set generator? the overwhelming majority of players ive played with and asked have said they used the item set generator.  

98 to 0. cmon rito. youve made your big changes now, it's time to listen to the will of the players again.
I really hope that you guys keep item sets. I have spent hours creating all my sets and I could not imagine playing League without them.
It does seem like they have gotten rid of the 'Item Sets' feature. I would hope that Riot does fix this, and re-add it back somewhere. I couldn't find it either.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
